categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Endor Station was a military base that was established by the Alliance to Restore the Republic on the moon Endor shortly after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. The Alliance nicknamed it Bright Tree Base in honor of the Ewoks of Bright Tree Village, who had assisted them during the battle.
The base was built from pre-fabricated structures and it included a starship hangar, medical facilities, and a command center.
